new_datasets.author: ClarusC64
new_datasets.description:
Predictive Fragility Ledger (v0.1)
	

A benchmark for forecast discipline.
PFL evaluates model behavior on prompts that make confident statements about the future.It measures whether a system can avoid:

ungrounded certainty  
causation jumps  
implicit timelines  
collapsing uncertainty into prediction

This dataset prioritizes boundary-aware forecasting:

qualify uncertainty
trace evidence when possible
state scope limits
avoid fabrication

Competence = clarity, not prophecy.
